title: PM saddened over loss of precious lives in DG Khan bus accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 19 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday expressed his deep shock and grief over the loss of previous lives in road accident near DG Khan.
“Shocked & deeply saddened to learn of the tragic road accident of a Rajanpur bound bus, near DG Khan resulting in the loss of 30 precious lives,” Imran Khan said in a tweet posted on his social media account.
Shocked & deeply saddened to learn of the tragic road accident of a Rajanpur bound bus, near DG Khan resulting in the loss of 30 precious lives. Have asked Punjab govt to offer rapid assistance & support to the families of the victims.
— Imran Khan (@ImranKhanPTI) July 19, 2021
The Prime Minister said that he has asked Punjab government to offer rapid assistance and support to the families of the victims.
